title: Octane Watch Face
summary: Digital Military Watch Face is an army styled watch face .
description: A Digital watch face designed like military style watches. Military style has hundreds of color options to choose from. Interactive features make the watch face easy for quick customizations. Best watch face of 2016.  Custom Features  ✔ Classic Design✔ Clean and simple look✔ Hour, Minute, Date - month and year display✔ Battery Indicator✔ Animated watch designed face✔ Supports ambient and normal modes✔ Designed for quick glances✔ Certain to give a Wow Effect!✔ Ranger Style design✔ Customizable Colors✔ Interactive watch face ✔ Tap watch face to change colors✔ Tap watch face to change 12/24 hour modes ✔ Round & Square Watch Face✔ Supported watches: Huawei Watch , Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch Download the best watch face for Android wear ! Installation/Common Synchronization problem & Solution:: If the Application does not appear on your watch please do the following:- uninstall the face- disconnect watch from phone- restart watch- connect watch and phone again- install Military Watch Face once againAndroid Wear App takes some time to sync all watch faces.In case of any problems, instead please contact us on: koherent.apps@gmail.comGive us maximum 24 hours to solve your problem and be a completely satisfied user of your newly acquired app.
descriptionHTML:
A Digital watch face designed like military style watches. Military style has hundreds of color options to choose from. Interactive features make the watch face easy for quick customizations. Best watch face of 2016.
Custom Features
✔ Classic Design
✔ Clean and simple look
✔ Hour, Minute, Date - month and year display
✔ Battery Indicator
✔ Animated watch designed face
✔ Supports ambient and normal modes
✔ Designed for quick glances
✔ Certain to give a Wow Effect!
✔ Ranger Style design
✔ Customizable Colors
✔ Interactive watch face
✔ Tap watch face to change colors
✔ Tap watch face to change 12/24 hour modes
✔ Round & Square Watch Face
✔ Supported watches: Huawei Watch , Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch

Download the best watch face for Android wear !
Installation/Common Synchronization problem & Solution::
If the Application does not appear on your watch please do the following:
- uninstall the face
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart watch
- connect watch and phone again
- install Military Watch Face once again

Android Wear App takes some time to sync all watch faces.

In case of any problems, instead please contact us on: koherent.apps@gmail.com
Give us maximum 24 hours to solve your problem and be a completely satisfied user of your newly acquired app.
comments: Cool army style watch face Awesome interactive customization. Helps me change settings on the go .
